productInformation.value: #9,668 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #86 in Disposable Diapers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Swimming Baby Must Have
reviews.reviewText: These are great!! They held up very well for our trip and then they also great just for our summer swim days. These are a must have so you don't get something in the pool that you definitely don't want. Parent Tip though when there is poop tear the sides that's a lesson I learned so you don't get it all down their leg and everywhere else! Hope this helps but I will be purchasing this time and time again when it's pool time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great swim diapers!
reviews.reviewText: Love these little swimmers. Does not swell up in the water and has convenient side tabs for easy removal. Comfy for baby leaving no marks on the skin. And gotta love the adorable print!I am a repeat buyer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it's supposed to do
reviews.reviewText: This product does as advertised. If you read the negative reviews its mostly people complaining that the swim diaper got wet. Well the purpose of the swim diaper is not to stay dry (does an adult bathing suit stay dry!?). They are just thinner than regular diapers and less absorbent so they don't blow up and soak up half the pool. The other function is that they keep the brown and yellow stuff IN, which these diapers also do quite well. They're pull up style so they make a nice seal around the legs and waist. Sizewise our guy wears regular diapers size 3 and the small of these fits perfectly. He's about 18lbs w chubby legs. This isn't rocket science, folks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huggies little swimmers
reviews.reviewText: Fit my one year great! The size small did match the weight unlike the pampers brand of little swimmers, they held up for the whole day and helped not make accident leak out into the pool. The size will also fit her next summer. I didn't have to get another size even when she went up a diaper size. Definitely worth the price I only had to buy one pack for the whole summer and even shared a few with some friends! Still have some left over and we went swimming alot! I was also able to let them sit out and dry and reuse them! For times she was only in our pool for a few minutes 😁😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do the job
reviews.reviewText: These diapers serve their intended purpose well. They effectively contain number 2, ensuring your child doesn't leave any surprises in the pool. They do not absorb pee. I was initially unaware of this and made the mistake of having my 2-year-old wear one to lunch before hitting the pool. It turns out, these diapers aren't designed for holding pee, so that was my oversight in not understanding their proper use.However, one positive aspect of swimming diapers like this is their durability. They don't disintegrate after prolonged exposure to water. My child found them comfortable, and there were no marks left behind after use, nor did she complain of any discomfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Leaks, Confidant to Put Baby in Any Pool
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my almost 6 month old grandson. He wears a size 3 regular diaper (he's a bit of a chunk) and this size is perfect. I had a hard time finding them in my Walmart/Target so it was just easier to purchase them from Amazon.I don't use them in a public pool as my daughter is wary of putting him in a public pool (I don't blame her). I have an Intex pool that I bought for him and I to play in so we don't have to worry about other babies not wearing swim diapers. I would be perfectly comfortable with him in someone else's pool wearing these (even without a vinyl diaper cover).I haven't tried any of the other brands of swim diapers but since these work so well I don't see the point.When first writing this review I was only going to give the product 4 stars because I thought I was going to receive Nemo diapers but instead I received pink Arial/Minnie Mouse design. I realized that isn't the product's fault so I didn't ding them on that. Amazon needs to fix the issue though since it is a Seller/Fulfilled by Amazon item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Will buy again , fits perfectly and it’s comfortable for my baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: These are so soft and contour perfectly to your baby’s bottom
reviews.reviewText: These are our go to swim diapers. We have tried several kinds. These are soft and fit well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 22, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Sono proprio dei bei pannolini per la funzione che devono fare anche se sinceramente è poco pratico per quando il piccolo fa la pipì dato che i liquidi non li trattengono...ma alla fine sono ok

my baby started swim lessons when she was 5 months old. she is very tiny and at the time only 14 pounds. at first I thought this diaper was going to be too big but it worked well for her and she will probably be wearing the same size throughout the summer.
Die Windeln passen gut und lassen sich gut an- und ausziehen.Alles bleibt wo es soll und so kann man schon mit den Kleinen ins Schwimmbad.
